rpg.game.actor

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.game.actor.Actor

  • public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an actor in an RPG. An actor consists of three things:
    1. An identity to tell one actor from another
    2. A collection of behaviors
    An actor is a base object for a componentized behavior system.
